name: Easybreeze Holiday Resort Invitation
desc: An invitation letter from the Easybreeze Holiday Resort. "Summer" and "Holiday" are words that always seem to be able to light up the night sky in radiant colors.

desc.text:
Heroic Traveler, your fame precedes you! On behalf of the entire Easybreeze Holiday Resort staff, we extend our warmest greetings to you and your companions.
As summer reaches its peak, our resort is proudly launching its trial operation. To express our heartfelt gratitude for everything you've done for Natlan, we cordially invite you and your companions to experience an extraordinary getaway in Tenochtzitoc.
All food, lodging, and entertainment expenses will be fully covered during the trial period. Present this letter to enjoy exclusive access to a private vista suite. We wish you a delightful journey ahead!
